title: Rick Grodin Joins Healthcare Administrative Partners as Executive Vice President
text:
MEDIA, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Healthcare Administrative Partners (HAP), a comprehensive revenue cycle management solutions provider, today announces the addition of Rick Grodin as the company’s Executive Vice President. He brings over 18 years of progressive healthcare management experience, with concentrations in revenue cycle management, provider-based operations, corporate development, and investment banking.
Mr. Grodin most recently served as Chief Operating Officer of Premier Urgent Care where he managed operations for a network of 18 urgent care clinics spread across PA and DE. Prior to that position, he spent six years at MedAssets, Inc. (acquired by Pamplona Capital) where he made substantial contributions in Consulting and Product Management through his roles as Senior Vice President and leader of the Spend & Clinical Resource Management segment. Mr. Grodin was also instrumental in revenue growth and strategic planning for the organization.
In his new role of Executive Vice President, Mr. Grodin will be responsible for developing new business lines, accelerating the growth of HAP’s consulting division, and facilitating the annual strategic planning process. Commenting on the hire, HAP’s President, Jane Knox, states that, “Rick’s vast experience in provider-based operations concentrated in large scale healthcare delivery operations and management will greatly expand our ability to serve the complex needs of our clients. He has a wealth of knowledge in our industry, and we are excited for him to drive HAP’s growth as we continue to evolve our solution set to meet the demands of modern providers in today’s dynamic healthcare economy.”
About Healthcare Administrative Partners
Healthcare Administrative Partners (HAP) empowers hospital-employed and privately owned physician groups to maximize revenue and minimize compliance risks despite the challenges of a complex, changing healthcare economy. We go beyond billing services, delivering the clinical analytics, practice management, and specialized coding expertise needed to fully optimize your revenue cycle. Since 1995, providers have turned to us as a trusted educator and true business partner.
